channel.title: Admin spells?

item.title: Admin spells?
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)
{
if(playerRights >= 2)
{
sendMessage(“Your magic level isn’t high enouch to cast this spell.”);
} else if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) {
sendMessage(“asdfasdf.”);
startAnimation(1979);
stillgfx3(369, 0, pl2.absY, pl2.absX, 2);
hitDiff = misc.random(30);
pl2.freeze2();
pl2.inCombat();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
} else if(playerRights <= 1) {
sendMessage(“Admins only.”);
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Admin spells?
item.dc:creator: @Danny068 Danny068
item.description:
@Danny068 wrote:

How do i miake Ice Barrage a mod spell? I have this in client at the moement but doesn’t work, it just lets anyone still do the spell.if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerRights >= 2) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(59); startAnimation(1979); //attackPlayersWithin(369, 59, 30); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; //stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 124) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell."); } }
and further down i have this

} } if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("Your magic level isn't high enouch to cast this spell."); } else if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { sendMessage("asdfasdf."); startAnimation(1979); stillgfx3(369, 0, pl2.absY, pl2.absX, 2); hitDiff = misc.random(30); pl2.freeze2(); pl2.inCombat(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } if(spellID == 12929) // blood barrage (lvl 92 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] < 92) { sendMessage("Your magic level isn't high enouch to cast this spell."); } else if(playerLevel[6] >= 92) { startAnimation(1979); stillgfx3(377, 0, pl2.absY, pl2.absX, 2); hitDiff = misc.random(27); pl2.inCombat(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; }
